channel.title: Help Please I Get This Error!
channel.description:
client.java:8673: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = You Have Successfully Logged In To LordZeroScape ^
i get that error? what does it mean can somebody help please! im trying to change that thing were you log in and it says (playername+ has logged in etc please help pleeeassee im using p16.3

item.title: Help Please I Get This Error!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.source: Help Please I Get This Error!

item.title: Help Please I Get This Error!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Rofl java u just reminded me… It says : “You Have Successfully Logged In To LordZeroScape” every single time someone logs on. So I could be playing for 5 min and archer logs on and then it says “You Have Successfully Logged In To LordZeroScape” even tho archer logged on. Rofl pointless noob code.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Please I Get This Error!

item.title: Help Please I Get This Error!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Heh, wouldn’t it actually send a message to everybody whenever ANYBODY logged in? That would be hilarious!

SpamScape!

item.title: Help Please I Get This Error!
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

They are right. Just one question though… Why would you send a message to EVERYONE that you have logged in?

It would be understandable if it was “player has logged in” but this is just silly.

-Alexia

Read full topic
item.source: Help Please I Get This Error!

item.title: Help Please I Get This Error!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It means that at the end of that “You Have Successfully Logged In To LordZeroScape” should look like this:

You Have Successfully Logged In To LordZeroScape;

Read full topic
item.source: Help Please I Get This Error!

You gotta put quotes around it genius -.- , as well as a semicolon at the end
